    • encode

      public WsEncoder.Result encode(Buffer in, ByteBuffer out, boolean endOfInput)
      Description copied from interface: Encoder
      Encodes a message.

      First encodes the message header set by Encoder.encode(MessageHeader) and then (optionally) adds payload data from in.

      Specified by:
      encode in interface Encoder<WsFrameHeader,WsFrameHeader>
      Parameters:
      in - the body data
      out - the buffer to which data is written
      endOfInput - true if there is no input left beyond the data currently in the in buffer (indicates end of body or no body at all)
      Returns:
      the result
